modName: Melee Weapon Range Fix USLEEP Patch
summary: Fix conflict between Melee Weapon Range and USLEEP
descriptionHtml:
1.DESCRIPTION
 
  Melee Weapon Range Fix (dragonborn and dawnguard version)is amazing mod but it change lots of race stuff that conflict with USLEEP.

  This adjust race setting to match USLEEP by TES5EDIT. Just take it if you need it.

  Thank you!

2.REQUIREMENT 

   a.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch
[/url]   b.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38148/?]Melee Weapon Range Fix[/url]

3.INSTALL

extract esp to ...\skyrim\data  replace WeaponRangeFix.esp

3.Credit

 Melee Weapon Range Fix - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/791565/][b]polymorpher[/b][/url]
author: aio369
